About Canvas Dalston Lane

Perfectly located on Shoreditch High Street, alongside three of our other buildings, 229 offers 12 private offices, meeting rooms, large board room and a perfect breakout/kitchen space and rooftop. House of Creative has been around for 8 years so we know what our client's needs are. We keep our pricing low and offer and all in service to make life easy for you.
